Detailed Description

MIDAS online connection, including access to online ODB.

00209         {
00210           fprintf(stderr, "TMidasOnline::receiveEvent: Cannot find request %d\n", requestId);
00211           return -1;
00212         }
00213 
00214       if (r->fRequestId == requestId)
00215         break;
00216 
00217       r = r->fNext;
00218     }
00219 
00220   int flag = 0;
00221   if (async)
00222     flag = ASYNC;
00223 
00224   int status = bm_receive_event(r->fBufferHandle, pevent, &size, flag);
00225 
00226   if (status == BM_ASYNC_RETURN)
00227     {
00228       return 0;
00229     }
00230 
00231   if (status != BM_SUCCESS)
00232     {
00233       fprintf(stderr, "TMidasOnline::receiveEvent: bm_receive_event() error %d\n", status);
00234       return -1;
00235     }
00236 
00237   return size;
00238 }
